about_the_game:
Game introduction:
Server opening gift package:SVIP777、SVIP888、SVIP999、XS666、XS777、XS888

"Abyss and Dungeon" is a fantasy adventure fighting game. The story takes place in the distant and mysterious Dancing Blade Continent. Due to the invasion of evil external forces, the entire continent is fragmented. In order to protect the only remaining pure land-Guangxi City-State, you will Transform into a talented heroic warrior, go deep into the abyss, defeat enemies and overcome obstacles along the way, unlock a large number of equipment and skills, challenge cross-server bosses in the abyss, and also have multiplayer dungeons, guild hegemony, treasure hunt in secret realms, job transfer awakening, and battle pets. There are a large number of unique gameplays. Dear warrior, your adventure is about to begin, come and experience it!

Game features:
[Fierce battle in the abyss, cool strikes]
Endless exploration in the dark dungeon, restoring the classic Abyss PC game-level ultra-clear graphics, refreshing combat combos, devastating instant kills, and full-screen release of cool special effects skills.

[Special copy, smooth competition]
There are multiple dungeons for you to challenge, bounty hunting for critical hits on the boss, teaming up with monster buffs, and PVP fair competition to dominate the entire server.

[Charming fashion, personalized matching]
Awaken and change careers, unlock rich set resources, create a variety of exclusive appearances and images at will, use skills to attack gorgeously, and upgrade with one click to double your combat power.

[Massive benefits, surprises]
Fancy gift packs, special ranking activities, equipment treasure chests, limited-time gifts, holiday celebrations, and massive welfare rewards are waiting for you!

[Super high explosion rate, free to hang up]
High degree of freedom to play the game, the explosion rate is transparent anywhere, automatic hang-up for instant combat, vertical screen operation is easy to get started, and the hang-up upgrade is guaranteed!
